movies.title: La damigella di Bard
movies.plot: In her later years, the manager of the estate for Countess Di Bard defrauds her, and she is forced to live in the garret of her palace. She accepts her unfortunate situation, until the daughter of the Marquis, who occupies the palace, falls in love with a young engineer, whom the Countess claims is the lost son of her murdered brother.

biography.placeOfBirth: Borgo San Donnino, Emilia-Romagna, Italy [now Fidenza]
biography.bio: Emma Gramatica was born on October 25, 1874 in Borgo San Donnino, Emilia-Romagna, Italy as Aida Laura Argia Gramatica. She was an actress and writer, known for Miracle in Milan (1951), La damigella di Bard (1938) and Small Hotel (1939). She died on November 8, 1965 in Ostia, Rome, Lazio, Italy.
biography.name: Emma Gramatica

biography.bio: Luigi Cimara was born on July 19, 1891 in Rome, Lazio, Italy. He was an actor, known for La damigella di Bard (1938), Il piacere dell'onestà (1954) and Caino (1918). He died on January 26, 1962 in Rome.
biography.name: Luigi Cimara

biography.bio: Carlo Tamberlani was born on March 11, 1899 in Salice Salentino, Puglia, Italy as Francesco Paolo Carlo Tamberlani. He was an actor, known for Sabata (1969), The Woman in the Painting (1955) and Cadavres exquis (1976). He died on August 5, 1980 in Subiaco, Lazio, Italy.
biography.name: Carlo Tamberlani

biography.bio: Cesare Bettarini was born on October 17, 1901 in Calenzano, Tuscany, Italy. He was an actor, known for La damigella di Bard (1938), The Wedding March (1936) and Fascino (1939). He died on October 19, 1975 in Calenzano.
biography.name: Cesare Bettarini

biography.bio: Amelia Chellini was born on June 16, 1880 in Florence, Tuscany, Italy as Amelia Creti. She was an actress, known for Giorno di nozze (1942), La damigella di Bard (1938) and Madeleine, zéro de conduite (1940). She was married to Didaco Chellini. She died on May 31, 1944 in Rome, Lazio, Italy.
biography.name: Amelia Chellini

biography.bio: Luigi Pavese was born on October 25, 1896 in Asti, Piedmont, Italy. He is known for his work on Sur la piste de l'Ouest sauvage (1965), Antonio Meucci (1940) and La porta (1964). He died on December 13, 1969 in Rome, Lazio, Italy.
biography.name: Luigi Pavese

biography.bio: Achille Majeroni was born on August 24, 1881 in Siracusa, Sicily, Italy. He is known for his work on I Vitelloni (1953), The Ape Woman (1964) and The Conjugal Bed (1963). He was married to Ersilia Arrighi and Lea Müller. He died on October 12, 1964 in Rome, Lazio, Italy.
biography.name: Achille Majeroni

biography.bio: Olga Pescatori is an actress, known for Passaporto rosso (1935), La damigella di Bard (1938) and Le sorprese del divorzio (1939).
biography.name: Olga Pescatori

biography.bio: Mirella Pardi is an actress, known for La damigella di Bard (1938), Dernier rendez-vous (1951) and Ricchezza senza domani (1940).
biography.name: Mirella Pardi

biography.bio: Armando Migliari was born on April 29, 1889 in Frosinone, Lazio, Italy. He was an actor, known for The Little World of Don Camillo (1952), L'honorable Angelina (1947) and Tomorrow Is Too Late (1950). He was married to Dora Menichelli. He died on June 15, 1976 in Rome, Lazio.
biography.name: Armando Migliari

biography.bio: Vasco Creti was born on December 7, 1874 in Florence, Tuscany, Italy. He was an actor, known for Company and the Crazy (1928), Sole! (1929) and La leggenda di Pierrette (1916). He died on October 16, 1945 in Rome, Lazio, Italy.
biography.name: Vasco Creti

biography.bio: Romolo Costa was born on February 26, 1897 in Asti, Piedmont, Italy. He is known for his work on They've Kidnapped a Man (1938), Together in the Dark (1935) and Il destino in tasca (1938). He died on January 1, 1965 in Rome, Lazio, Italy.
biography.name: Romolo Costa

biography.bio: Pina Valli is an actress, known for La damigella di Bard (1938) and The Duchess of Parma (1938).
biography.name: Pina Valli

biography.bio: Mario Brizzolari is an actor, known for Sant'Elena, piccola isola (1943), Sette giorni cento lire (1933) and Star of the Sea (1938).
biography.name: Mario Brizzolari

biography.bio: Eugenio Duse was born on January 24, 1889 in Senigallia, Marche, Italy. He was an actor, known for Cainà (1922), The Life of Giuseppe Verdi (1938) and The Siege of the Alcazar (1940). He died on November 24, 1969 in Bologna, Emilia-Romagna, Italy.
biography.name: Eugenio Duse
